translation.en: Lookie here. My day is made.
translation.ja: こりゃあ朝からツイてるな

translation.en: I didn't even finish breakfast and I get to kill me a stinkin' Injun.
translation.ja: 朝メシ前に インディアンを殺せるぜ

translation.en: Injun?
translation.ja: インディアン？

translation.en: Nah.
translation.ja: 違うね

translation.en: I just dress like this so's I don't get scalped out on the prairie.
translation.ja: 連中に襲われないよう 扮装してる

translation.en: Oh, well, that's a convincing outfit.
translation.ja: すっかり見間違えたよ

translation.en: Yeah, you can't be too safe out there... with all of them savages runnin' around.
translation.ja: 用心に越したことはない 先住民どもは残虐だからな

translation.en: So, what can I do you for?
translation.ja: 何か お探しで？

translation.en: Need some flour. Five sacks.
translation.ja: 小麦粉が欲しい　５袋だ

translation.en: And a carrot with peanut butter on it.
translation.ja: ピーナツバターを塗った 人参も

translation.en: Now, what's that gonna run me?
translation.ja: いくらだ？

translation.en: Well, sack of flour's 45 cents.
translation.ja: 小麦粉は１袋45セント

translation.en: So, five sacks...
translation.ja: だから５袋で…

translation.en: Wanna get back to me on that?
translation.ja: 計算しといてくれ

translation.en: Yeah, look... Now, the flour's in the basement.
translation.ja: 分かった 小麦粉は地下室だ

translation.en: You can fetch it yourself.
translation.ja: 自分でどうぞ

translation.en: Much obliged.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Well, lookie what we got here.
translation.ja: こりゃあ驚いたな

translation.en: Sweet piece of red prairie meat out all by her lonesome.
translation.ja: 赤い肌のピチピチ娘が たった１人で

translation.en: - What do you make of that, Nelly? - Oh, I think she's waiting on you, Will.
translation.ja: なんでかな お前を待ってたのさ

translation.en: Go on, get on it.  It's on now.
translation.ja: 行ってやれ

translation.en: Yeah.  Go get her, Will.
translation.ja: いいぞ ウィル

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.ja: さあ 行け

translation.en: Now, you must be wondering why five badass hombres with perfect jawlines...
translation.ja: 聞かせてやろうか 俺たちみたいな イケメンが―

translation.en: all sport the same stylish eye patch.
translation.ja: 揃いのアイパッチを してる理由を

translation.en: Not my business.
translation.ja: 興味ないわ

translation.en: We all carved our eyeballs out our skull
translation.ja: みんな 目玉をほじくり出したんだ

translation.en: to show how devoted we are to this gang.
translation.ja: 仲間への忠誠の証しとしてな

translation.en: We the Left- Eye Boys!
translation.ja: 俺たちは“左目(レフト･アイ)ボーイズ”！

translation.en: You got real pretty eyes, miss.
translation.ja: きれいな目をしてるな

translation.en: You reckon we can, I don't know, borrow one? - - Can we borrow one?
translation.ja: 俺たちに １個 貸してくれよ

translation.en: Now, is that a proper question to ask a lady?
translation.ja: レディに何てマネをする

translation.en: Who are you, slick? The boyfriend?
translation.ja: この女と いい仲なのか？

translation.en: Soon to be the husband.
translation.ja: 結婚するんだ

translation.en: Oh, wait a minute! That's a white boy under that getup.
translation.ja: 待てよ あんな格好して白人だぞ

translation.en: That's a white boy? Oh, shit.
translation.ja: 白人か？ マジかよ

translation.en: You partial to pale faces, Poca- hot- tits?
translation.ja: 白い顔が好きか ポカボインタス

translation.en: 'Cause I can show you what a real white man's like.
translation.ja: 本当の白人男を見せてやる

translation.en: - Yeah, show her, Will. Yeah, go on. - Yeah, shuffle up, Will.
translation.ja: いいぞ 見せてやれ

translation.en: - Dance now, boy. - Shuffle on over.
translation.ja: いいぞ その腰！

translation.en: - There you go. - That's some white boy shit right there.
translation.ja: これが白人だ

translation.en: Now, I do want to carve my eyes out.
translation.ja: 目をくり抜きたい

translation.en: - What'd you say? - Hey, fellers...
translation.ja: 何だと！ お前ら

translation.en: I'd hit the trail before you get hurt.
translation.ja: ケガする前に やめな

translation.en: Before we get hurt?
translation.ja: 俺たちが？

translation.en: - Before we get hurt. -
translation.ja: ケガするってさ

translation.en: I think you've been smokin' too much of that peace pipe, kemo- slobby.
translation.ja: 妙なパイプの吸いすぎで イカれたか

translation.en: - - Now, from what I see, there's one of you,
translation.ja: 見たところ お前は１人

translation.en: and there's five of us.
translation.ja: こっちは５人だ

translation.en: Four of you.
translation.ja: ４人だな

translation.en: What just happened?
translation.ja: 今 何が？

translation.en: You wanna see it again?
translation.ja: 見たいか？

translation.en: Uh... yes.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: - I don't like this shit. - Shut up.
translation.ja: 何か やだな 黙れ

translation.en: Well, that's some, uh... real fancy footwork.
translation.ja: 確かに 大したフットワークだ

translation.en: But I think this hullabaloo has escalated to the firearms stage.
translation.ja: だが ここからは 銃がものを言うからな

translation.en: Boys, let's ventilate this.
translation.ja: 風穴を開けてやろうぜ

translation.en: What the shit that just happened?
translation.ja: 何が起きたんだ？

translation.en: What the hell? What in the hell?
translation.ja: 何なんだ これは チクショウめ

translation.en: Hit the trail. It was so simple.
translation.ja: やめなと言ったのに

translation.en: You must stop doing this, White Knife. One day, there will be too many.
translation.ja: 危ない目に遭うわよ “白いナイフの男”

translation.en: But not today, Smoking Fox.
translation.ja: でも今日は無事だ

translation.en: Please, my love... we must go.
translation.ja: 困った人ね　行きましょ

translation.en: What the hell happened out here?
translation.ja: 何があったんだ？

translation.en: Injuns. They went that way.
translation.ja: インディアンが あっちへ

translation.en: You ain't no white man.
translation.ja: 白人じゃないな

translation.en: You're that orphan, White Knife.
translation.ja: 孤児の白いナイフだろ

translation.en: Raised like an animal with those Apaches.
translation.ja: アパッチ族に 育てられたってな

translation.en: You think you can fool ol' Clem?
translation.ja: だませると思ったか

translation.en: Sorry, Ringo.
translation.ja: 悪いな

translation.en: Well, now I'm gonna shoot you and your Injun whore.
translation.ja: 仕留めてやる 汚(けが)れたインディアン女もだ

translation.en: Gotta cut breakfast short.
translation.ja: 朝メシは終わり

translation.en: You suck, mister!
translation.ja: 何てことするんだ！

translation.en: You suck!
translation.ja: このヤロー！ このヤロー！ リディキュラス･シックス

translation.en: What are you?
translation.ja: リディキュラス･シックス 何者だよ！

translation.en: Go, White Knife.
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: You lucky, Smoking Fox.
translation.ja: 運がいいわね

translation.en: White Knife all man. Bravest of all braves.
translation.ja: 白いナイフは 誰よりも勇敢だわ

translation.en: Not brave. Foolish.
translation.ja: 勇敢じゃない　バカよ

translation.en: I want to be wife, not widow.
translation.ja: あれじゃ早死にする

translation.en: Afternoon, ladies.
translation.ja: やあ 皆さん

translation.en: This is Apache land.
translation.ja: ここはアパッチの土地

translation.en: I'm not here to take your land, Chief.
translation.ja: 土地を奪う気はない

translation.en: I'm just looking for a particular boy.
translation.ja: 男の子を捜しに来たんだ

translation.en: I'm Frank Stockburn.
translation.ja: 俺は フランク･ストックバーン

translation.en: This boy's mother was my wife.
translation.ja: 女房が産んだ子で―

translation.en: And the boy, Tommy...
translation.ja: 名前はトミー

translation.en: he's my son.
translation.ja: 俺の息子だ

translation.en: It is wise to be slow to trust, White Knife.
translation.ja: 用心深いのは賢明なことだが

translation.en: But every new journey begins with a single step.
translation.ja: どんな道も まず踏み出さないと

translation.en: Speak with your father.
translation.ja: 父親と話せ

translation.en: But you are my father, Screaming Eagle.
translation.ja: 俺の父は あなただ

translation.en: Ever since my mother...
translation.ja: あの日 俺を―

translation.en: Ever since you found me...
translation.ja: 拾ってくれた

translation.en: you taught me to hunt, to fight...
translation.ja: すべて教えてくれた

translation.en: when to speak and when to be silent.
translation.ja: 狩りも戦いも 人としての生き方も

translation.en: - To be a man. - A good man.
translation.ja: 狩りも戦いも 人としての生き方も “立派な人”だ

translation.en: And this Frank Stockburn,
translation.ja: あのフランクは―

translation.en: he is filled with lies, just like every other white man.
translation.ja: 他の白人と同じ ウソばっかりだ

translation.en: Sometimes, the white man speaks the truth.
translation.ja: 白人も たまには 本当のことを話す

translation.en: Like, one in 20, 25 times.
translation.ja: 20～25回に１回ぐらいは

translation.en: I believe this is one of those times.
translation.ja: これは本当のことかも

translation.en: He knew your mother, White Knife.
translation.ja: 母親の話を聞けば―

translation.en: Maybe he can give you some peace. Talk to him.
translation.ja: 心に平和が 訪れるかもしれないぞ

translation.en: Maybe after I close my eyes to dream.
translation.ja: 夢の中ででも聞くよ

translation.en: Mommy!
translation.ja: ママ！

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: ダメだな

translation.en: One look at me, and you knew your old man had done a lot of bad things, didn't ya?
translation.ja: ひと目 見て― 俺が悪行を繰り返してきたと 見抜いたな

translation.en: I cheated men, I killed men...
translation.ja: 俺は人をだまし 殺してきた

translation.en: So I deserve whatever's comin' to me.
translation.ja: どうなろうと仕方ない俺だが

translation.en: The only one that ever saw any good in me was your mother.
translation.ja: お前の母さんだけは 褒めてくれた

translation.en: Why have you come here?
translation.ja: 何が目的だ

translation.en: Not a man for chitchat, huh?
translation.ja: 余計な話は したくないか

translation.en: Well, me neither.
translation.ja: まあ 俺も同じだ

translation.en: Kid, I'm dying...
translation.ja: 俺はもう長くない

translation.en: of consumption.
translation.ja: 肺をやられた

translation.en: Don't worry...
translation.ja: 心配するな

translation.en: I'm not looking for no big father- son hoo- ah.
translation.ja: 感動の再会なんぞ したいとは思ってない

translation.en: I love you, son.
translation.ja: “愛してるぞ”

translation.en: I love you too, Daddy.
translation.ja: “僕もだよ　パパ”

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: 勘弁だ

translation.en: I've come for a more tangible reason.
translation.ja: ここへ来たのは もっと実のあることのためだ

translation.en: Tommy, I've been stealing from folks since I was nine years old...
translation.ja: 俺は９歳の頃から 他人様のものを盗んできた

translation.en: and that's the way I've amassed a good little fortune.
translation.ja: そのおかげで けっこうな 金を残すことができた

translation.en: I wanna do something decent with it.
translation.ja: せめて うまく使いたい

translation.en: I want to give it to you, son.
translation.ja: だから お前にやるよ

translation.en: I don't want your money.
translation.ja: 要らないね

translation.en: But maybe you could give...
translation.ja: ５万ドルだぞ

translation.en: $50,000 to these nice Injuns who raised you.
translation.ja: 育ててくれたインディアンに やったらどうだ

translation.en: We'll take it.
translation.ja: もらうわ

translation.en: Go back to bed.
translation.ja: 戻ってろ

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: Seriously, though, we'll take it.
translation.ja: でも もらうよ

translation.en: Look, it's buried in the meadow just up the trail,
translation.ja: その先の草原に埋めてある

translation.en: next to a big ol' pine tree.
translation.ja: 大きな松の木の根元に

translation.en: What do you say we go dig it up in the morning and start playing Santa Claus?
translation.ja: 一緒に掘り出して サンタクロースにならないか

translation.en: I don't remember much about my mother...
translation.ja: かすかな記憶しかないが―

translation.en: but I do remember her telling me...
translation.ja: 母さんは言ってた

translation.en: you were dead.
translation.ja: “父さんは死んだ”と

translation.en: Maybe it was because...
translation.ja: 俺を探させないために―

translation.en: she didn't want you to come looking for me.
translation.ja: そんなウソをついたんだろう

translation.en: She was a smart lady.
translation.ja: 賢い女だった

translation.en: Only stupid thing she ever did was fall for me.
translation.ja: 俺を愛したのだけは 愚かだったがな

translation.en: Meeting Betty Dunson...
translation.ja: ベティとの出会いは―

translation.en: was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.ja: 俺の生涯で 一番の幸運だった

translation.en: From the first day I laid eyes on her...
translation.ja: 最初に会ったその日から 彼女は―

translation.en: she was bawlin' out this...
translation.ja: 俺に怒鳴り散らした

translation.en: half- drunk, big ol' burly blacksmith...
translation.ja: この飲んだくれの 不愛想な鍛冶職人にね

translation.en: down at Silver Canyon.
translation.ja: シルバー･キャニオンで

translation.en: She's been the only one, Tommy.
translation.ja: あんな女 ほかにいない

translation.en: Mom had a temper?
translation.ja: すぐ怒った？

translation.en: Temper? When she got her dander up, look out.
translation.ja: かんしゃくを起こしたら 大変だったよ

translation.en: We was in a saloon once.
translation.ja: ある時 酒場で―

translation.en: This fellow sitting next to her
translation.ja: 隣の席にいた男が 彼女に話しだした

translation.en: starts talking about the perfect way to make a cherry pie...
translation.ja: 隣の席にいた男が 彼女に話しだした 完璧なチェリーパイの 作り方について…

translation.en: So your mom says to me, Frank, come here a minute.
translation.ja: 彼女は言った “フランク　ちょっと来て”

translation.en: Tell me again, just where did you get them flowers?
translation.ja: “この花は どこで手に入れたの？”

translation.en: I said, I know that you think I stole them from the graveyard.
translation.ja: 彼女は疑ってたんだ 俺が墓場で盗んできたと

translation.en: Good morning, boys.
translation.ja: おはよう！

translation.en: Morning, Never Wears Bra.
translation.ja: やあ ブラを着けない女

translation.en: I had dream about you last night, White Knife.
translation.ja: あんたの夢を見たわよ

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Not nice dream.
translation.ja: いい夢じゃない

translation.en: In dream, you naughty.
translation.ja: あんたはスケベだった

translation.en: You naughty, White Knife.
translation.ja: 悪い男だわ　白いナイフ

translation.en: Mmm, somebody's got an admirer.
translation.ja: モテるようだな

translation.en: - - Yes, yes.
translation.ja: まあね　だけど―

translation.en: But like you, there's only one woman for me.
translation.ja: あんたと同じで 俺には１人だけ

translation.en: I guess we Stockburns are...
translation.ja: ストックバーン家の男は―

translation.en: partial to the sweet ones.
translation.ja: かわいい女に弱い

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.ja: 確かに

translation.en: Like your mother.
translation.ja: お前の母親も…

translation.en: How did she die, Tommy?
translation.ja: なんで死んだ？

translation.en: You tell me?
translation.ja: 教えてくれ

translation.en: Well, there were these big kids at school fixin' to beat me up.
translation.ja: 学校で年上の子たちが 計画してたんだ 俺をボコるって

translation.en: Instead of facing them myself, I had her walk me there.
translation.ja: 俺は立ち向かえず 母さんに送ってもらった

translation.en: This feller comes out of nowhere...
translation.ja: そしたら男が現れて―

translation.en: walks right up to her and shoots her dead.
translation.ja: 母さんを撃って殺した

translation.en: So that's how she died, protecting her gutless son
translation.ja: 腰抜けの息子を守って 死んだんだ

translation.en: instead of being home, safe where she belonged.
translation.ja: 普段どおり家にいれば 安全だったのに

translation.en: Who's that? Is that Bony Express?
translation.ja: 何だ？ 速達郵便か？

translation.en: Bony Express don't come around here.
translation.ja: ここに郵便は来ない

translation.en: He's here somewhere, boys.
translation.ja: いるはずだぞ

translation.en: Let's burn him out!
translation.ja: いぶり出せ

translation.en: Next one goes through your forehead.
translation.ja: 次は額を狙うぞ

translation.en: Hey, hey! No need to burn nothing, boys!
translation.ja: いぶり出す必要はない

translation.en: Howdy, boss.
translation.ja: やあ ボス

translation.en: Cicero...
translation.ja: シセロ

translation.en: you're not gonna let a man enjoy his retirement, are ya?
translation.ja: 俺は引退したんだ ほっといてくれ

translation.en: No, Frank, I salute your decision to turn from your sinful ways.
translation.ja: 悪事から足を洗ったのは 立派だと思うよ

translation.en: But the money... that belongs to all of us.
translation.ja: だが あの金は みんなのものだ

translation.en: Touch that steel, boy,
translation.ja: 手を出すな

translation.en: I got plenty of bullets left over after I put one in...
translation.ja: 弾をぶち込んでやるぞ

translation.en: your father.
translation.ja: 親父さんに

translation.en: Oh, you finally found your long lost son.
translation.ja: 息子を見つけたか

translation.en: Well, I sure hate to break up this nice family reunion.
translation.ja: 再会に水を差す気はないんだ

translation.en: So, why don't you give us the money you stole
translation.ja: 盗んだ金を出してもらおうか

translation.en: before I put lead in your head.
translation.ja: でないと鉛をぶち込むぞ

translation.en: The money's buried.
translation.ja: 埋めてある

translation.en: Way to run your mouth, son.
translation.ja: お前は黙ってろ

translation.en: It's buried?
translation.ja: 埋めた？

translation.en: Yeah, I buried it.
translation.ja: そう　埋めた

translation.en: Deep in the ground... next to a windmill.
translation.ja: 深く埋めたよ 風車のそばだ

translation.en: A windmill in the West...
translation.ja: この西部で風車だ？

translation.en: doesn't narrow it down much, Frank.
translation.ja: 死ぬほどあるだろ

translation.en: Well, this is a special windmill.
translation.ja: 特別な風車小屋だ

translation.en: It's a singing windmill.
translation.ja: “歌う風車”さ

translation.en: A singing windmill!
translation.ja: 歌う風車だと？

translation.en: It's about a ten- day ride from here.
translation.ja: 馬で10日ほどの距離だ

translation.en: I'll lead you to it presently on one condition.
translation.ja: 条件をのむなら案内しよう

translation.en: You don't hurt my boy...
translation.ja: 息子に手を出すな

translation.en: or any of these kindly Injuns here.
translation.ja: ここのインディアンにも

translation.en: Let's ride, Frank.
translation.ja: よし 行こう

translation.en: Frank, if that $50,000 isn't under that windmill,
translation.ja: 風車のそばに金がなければ

translation.en: I'm gonna bury you up to your neck and let the desert critters eat you alive.
translation.ja: 首まで埋めて 砂漠の虫ケラに食わすからな

translation.en: It's there, Cicero, it's there.
translation.ja: 金なら ちゃんとある

translation.en: I'm glad I got to meet Betty Dunson's son.
translation.ja: ベティの息子に 会えてよかった

translation.en: You just stay here, Tommy.
translation.ja: お前は ここに残れ

translation.en: Enjoy your life with your beautiful bride...
translation.ja: 幸せにな きれいな花嫁と―

translation.en: amongst these majestic pine trees.
translation.ja: 大きな松の木に囲まれて 暮らすんだ

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: Well, that was uncool.
translation.ja: なんか感じ悪いな

translation.en: White Knife, you must rest.
translation.ja: 白いナイフ　休んで

translation.en: How can I rest?
translation.ja: 休めないよ

translation.en: When they get to the singing windmill and find no money, they will kill him.
translation.ja: 風車に金がなければ 父が殺される

translation.en: My son, there are too many trees and too little time.
translation.ja: 木は多い とても間に合わないよ

translation.en: Then I must get this $50,000 another way.
translation.ja: なら 他の方法で手に入れる

translation.en: How? By stealing? There is no honor in that.
translation.ja: 強盗でもする気か 不名誉なことだ

translation.en: Unless I steal from those who have no honor.
translation.ja: 不名誉な連中から盗むのなら 話は別だろ

translation.en: Ooh... I like that.
translation.ja: なるほど　そりゃいいな

translation.en: But it is too dangerous.
translation.ja: でも危険だわ

translation.en: I will send ten of our strongest braves with you.
translation.ja: 勇士を10人 連れていけ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: The braves would be treated too cruelly in the white man's world.
translation.ja: 白人から ひどい扱いを受ける

translation.en: A lot of them can pass for pale face.
translation.ja: 彼らも傍目には白人だ

translation.en: Raging Bear can actually do a great impression of a white guy.
translation.ja: “猛烈な熊の男”は 物真似もうまい

translation.en: Hey, guys, let's play with our chest hair and eat potato chips.
translation.ja: やあ 胸毛とポテチで 楽しもうぜ

translation.en: Wasn't that great? Where does he come up with this stuff?
translation.ja: どこで覚えたんだろうな

translation.en: That's very good, Bear, but I must walk this path alone.

There's another 50 grand?

translation.ja: 俺たちが悪に走ると思うか

translation.en: 'Cause it's in your blood.
translation.ja: 俺の息子だろ

translation.en: Answer me something.
translation.ja: 考えてみろ

translation.en: Were you ever great at anything in your life besides stealing?
translation.ja: お前ら 盗み以外に 得意なことはあったか？

translation.en: No. No.
translation.ja: なかっただろ

translation.en: You apples didn't fall far from this tree.
translation.ja: 父親である この俺に似てるんだよ

translation.en: Don't deny who you are.
translation.ja: お前らの真の姿はな

translation.en: If you knew who we really were,
translation.ja: 俺たちの真の姿を知れば―

translation.en: you'd be very scared right now.
translation.ja: あんたもビビるはずだ

translation.en: Don't overplay your hand, son.
translation.ja: 強がってもムダだぞ

translation.en: I'm still holding an ace.
translation.ja: 俺には切り札もある

translation.en: I found her. I--
translation.ja: 見つけた

translation.en: I told you I'd find her.
translation.ja: 言っただろ

translation.en: This little beauty stumbled into our camp a few days ago.
translation.ja: ２～３日前 この美人を野営地で見つけた

translation.en: She actually tried to rescue me.
translation.ja: 俺を救おうとしていた

translation.en: I'm guessing this means you don't want me to be your best man no more, huh?
translation.ja: 俺に付き添い役を頼もうとは 思わないだろ

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna make this real simple for you.
translation.ja: 何も難しいことは言わん

translation.en: Hand over the other 50 grand... in that stupid ass' saddlebag,
translation.ja: ロバのサドルバッグごと― ５万ドルをよこすんだ さもないと―

translation.en: or I put a bullet in her pretty Apache head.
translation.ja: ５万ドルをよこすんだ さもないと― 弾をぶち込む かわいいアパッチにな

translation.en: That ain't gonna happen.
translation.ja: そうはいかない

translation.en: Oh, it ain't?
translation.ja: そうか？

translation.en: No, sir.
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: Why's that?
translation.ja: なんでだ？

translation.en: Mmm... kind of a secret.
translation.ja: 秘密だよ

translation.en: Well, you can tell your old man, can't ya?
translation.ja: 父さんには 教えてくれてもいいだろ

translation.en: You know that bag... - your boy's holding? - Uh- huh.
translation.ja: あんたの手下が 持ってるバッグ

translation.en: It was meant for Cicero.
translation.ja: シセロに渡すはずだ

translation.en: So there's something special in there.
translation.ja: だから中身も特製だった

translation.en: - Plan B. - Plan B?
translation.ja: プランＢだ プランＢ？

translation.en: Give me that bag.
translation.ja: あのバッグを

translation.en: Oh, shit!
translation.ja: マズい！

translation.en: Where is she?
translation.ja: 彼女はどこだ

translation.en: Smoking Fox.
translation.ja: 艶やかなキツネ

translation.en: Nighty- night, son.
translation.ja: もう寝ろ

translation.en: - Danny, are you all right? -
translation.ja: ダニー　大丈夫か

translation.en: You done good, Daniel. You saved me.
translation.ja: 見事に私を守ってくれたな

translation.en: It's my duty, Mr. President.
translation.ja: 任務ですから　大統領

translation.en: Mrs. Lincoln.
translation.ja: 奥様

translation.en: Come on! Come on! Come here.
translation.ja: 来い こっちだ

translation.en: Get in.
translation.ja: とっとと入れ

translation.en: I got one!
translation.ja: 仕留めた

translation.en: Clem, you almost shot me!
translation.ja: 俺に当たるとこだ

translation.en: Come on, get the horses!
translation.ja: 馬に乗るんだ

translation.en: My ass! My ass!
translation.ja: ケツをやられた！

translation.en: Is this here still valid, or is it too burnt up?
translation.ja: まだ使える？ 焦げすぎてる？

translation.en: Let me take a look here.
translation.ja: 見せてみろ

translation.en: Uh, that looks good to me. I mean, this looks good.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　使えそうだ

translation.en: What in the hell?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: You didn't scoop yours out, did you?
translation.ja: 目をえぐってないのか？

translation.en: What was the question again?
translation.ja: 質問は何？

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: ウソだろ

translation.en: Did any of you really do it?
translation.ja: くり抜いた奴は？

translation.en: Well, then whose eyes are in that jar?
translation.ja: ビンの目玉は誰のだ？

translation.en: Well, Babyface found some rocks, and, uh, painted them.
translation.ja: 拾ってきた石に 色を塗ったんだ

translation.en: Surprise?
translation.ja: サプライズだろ

translation.en: Hey, Tom, you wanna play a game
translation.ja: トミー　ゲームでもしよう

translation.en: to make up for all the father- son time we missed?
translation.ja: 父と子の時間を 取り戻そうじゃないか

translation.en: Peek- a- boo.
translation.ja: いないいないばあ

translation.en: Hey, come over here!
translation.ja: ほら こっちだ

translation.en: No, come over there!
translation.ja: 違う　あっちだ

translation.en: You could have had everything, son.
translation.ja: お前も惜しかったな

translation.en: But you had to do the right thing.
translation.ja: 最後に選択を誤ったわけだ

translation.en: Let me leave you with a bit of fatherly advice.
translation.ja: 父親らしく ためになることを教えよう

translation.en: - Never bring a knife to a gunfight. -
translation.ja: 銃を相手に ナイフじゃ勝てないんだよ

translation.en: One day, there will be too many, my love.
translation.ja: いつか危ない目に遭う

translation.en: But not today.
translation.ja: でも今日は無事

translation.en: That was some mystical shit.
translation.ja: なんて神秘的な技だ

translation.en: Tommy.
translation.ja: トミー

translation.en: You knew Cicero killed my mother.
translation.ja: 母さんを殺した犯人を 知ってたな

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: まさか

translation.en: No, I didn't know that.
translation.ja: 知らなかった

translation.en: No more lies!
translation.ja: ウソは たくさんだ

translation.en: Yeah, I knew. I knew.
translation.ja: そう 知ってた

translation.en: Your mother insisted on telling.
translation.ja: 俺たち一味のことを―

translation.en: She was going to rat the whole gang out, and I tried to convince her--
translation.ja: 密告しようとしてたんだ 止めたのに

translation.en: Tommy, look, I'm your father, for God's sake.
translation.ja: トミー　俺はお前の父親だぞ

translation.en: You don't kill your father, Tommy.
translation.ja: 父親は殺せないだろ　トミー

translation.en: His name is White Knife.
translation.ja: 彼の名前は “白いナイフの男”

translation.en: I ain't gonna kill you.
translation.ja: 殺しはしない

translation.en: 'Cause my true father taught me otherwise.
translation.ja: 真の父の教えに 背くことになるから

translation.en: You can't leave me like this!
translation.ja: ここに置いていく気か？

translation.en: Tommy!
translation.ja: トミー！

translation.en: You can't leave me here alone!
translation.ja: 置き去りにするなよ！

translation.en: Dear Mama, so much has changed since my last letter.
translation.ja: “前の手紙から いろんなことがあったよ”

translation.en: I scarcely know where to begin.
translation.ja: “どこから書こうか…”

translation.en: First off, it turns out our daddy is a bad, bad man,
translation.ja: “まず 僕たちのパパは 本当に悪い奴だった”

translation.en: and he got thrown in jail.
translation.ja: “だから牢屋送りだ”

translation.en: But it's okay, 'cause Screaming Eagle, the Indian chief who raised Tommy,
translation.ja: “でも もういい” “トミーを育てた部族の首長 叫ぶワシが―”

translation.en: said he'd be all our dads, too.
translation.ja: “みんなのパパに なってくれた”

translation.en: I really like it here in this village.
translation.ja: “この村が気に入ったよ”

translation.en: Our new brothers and sisters love to have fun
translation.ja: “新しい家族は 楽しい人たちだし―”

translation.en: and have been so nice to all of us.
translation.ja: “僕たちにも 優しくしてくれる”

translation.en: These white guys cannot dance.
translation.ja: 白人どもはヘタだな

translation.en: Danny don't drink whiskey no more.
translation.ja: “ダニーは酒をやめた”

translation.en: - No. - Yee- haw!
translation.ja: いや 結構

translation.en: And Ramon and Herm are trying to learn Indian ways.
translation.ja: “先住民の技を 習ったりしてるし”

translation.en: Oh, and big news...
translation.ja: “そして すごいニュース”

translation.en: I finally have a girlfriend,
translation.ja: “僕にも彼女ができた”

translation.en: and she's much prettier than a canty- loupe.
translation.ja: “メロンより ずっと美人なんだ”

translation.en: Come on, you two! You're missing all the fun.
translation.ja: こっちで一緒に踊ろう

translation.en: Anyways, Mama, thanks for raising me.
translation.ja: “ママ　育ててくれて ありがとう”

translation.en: Your loving son, Lil Pete,
translation.ja: “愛する息子” “リディキュラス６の 誇り高き一員”

translation.en: proud member of the Ridiculous 6.
translation.ja: “リディキュラス６の 誇り高き一員” “リル･ピートより”

translation.en: Before you go...
translation.ja: エールの交換だ

translation.en: Two, four, six, eight. Who do we appreciate?
translation.ja: ２ ４ ６ ８ どこの 誰が 頑張った？

translation.en: The Stockburns! The Stockburns!
translation.ja: ストックバーン兄弟！

translation.en: Yeah! The Stockburns!
translation.ja: すごいぞ ストックバーン！
